__TOC__

* Make: Packard Bell
* Brand: EasyNote
* Model: BU45-U-075D
* Website: http://support.packardbell.com/uk/item/index.php?m=home&pn=PB72ED0391

=== Current issues ===
* The fingerprint reader isn't recognized by thinkfinger
* Integrated webcam is not supported, see http://www.progweb.com/modules/asus/index-en.html for workaround
* The integrated webcam driver, see http://syntekdriver.sourceforge.net/
* The integrated mic working, when webcam is in use (Syntek driver installed).
* Suspend doesn't resume, see bug #117422
* Feisty
** Screen resolution isn't automatically recognized as 1280x800
** No sound
* Gutsy
** Sound works, integrated mic doesn't

=== Hardware ===
* Intel Core Duo T2080
* 1 GB RAM
* 160 GB hdd
* Intel 945GM Integrated Graphics Controller
* 12" TFT WideScreen WXGA 1280x800
* Realtek HD Audio
* Intel PRO/Wireless 3945ABG Network Connection
* Realtek RTL8101E PCI Express Fast Ethernet
* DVD+/-RW
* 1.3 Mpix webcam
